AppName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

AppDesc.message: Select the number on your page, right click and show result in bubble. SUPER FAST WAY!
AppDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

AppShortName.description: The short title of the application, displayed in the web store.

installationWarning.message: ATTENTION: You have to add the custom currency exchange rules once this extension is installed or upgraded!

method1.message: Select the number text on page ( You don't even select the exact only number, this tool can extract the number from text!)

method3.message: Choose the exchange action you want to make

method4.message: The result will show next to your number in bubble

addExMap.message: Add exchange mapping into right-click menu

addMappingDone.message: Added new current exchange setting! You can try the new added currency exchange in new page now

mappingListHint.message: You can adjust the order by dragging and dropping
